util.config

Class ConfigReader<T,M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.config.ConfigReader<T,M>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigProvider<M>

    public abstract class ConfigReader<T,M>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigProvider<M>
    A configuration provider that reads items of type T from a source provider and transform them into objects of type M.

    • Method Detail

      • newReader

        public static <T,M> ConfigProvider<M> newReader(ConfigProvider<T> configSource,
                                                java.util.function.Function<T,M> itemMapper)
        Creates a new configuration provider out of a source configuration provider so that its source items of type T are transformed into objects of type M.
        Parameters:
        configSource - reads items of type T from configuration.
        itemMapper - the transformation to apply to each item read from configSource to produce objects of type M.
        Returns:
        a new configuration provider to transform the source items.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any argument is null.

      • mapItem

        protected abstract M mapItem(T configEntry)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        A transformation to apply to each item read from our configuration provider.
        Parameters:
        configEntry - the configuration item to transform.
        Returns:
        the transformed item.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a transformation error occurs, e.g. parsing a string into an integer.

      • readConfig

        public java.util.stream.Stream<M> readConfig()
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ConfigProvider
        Reads items from configuration.
        Specified by:
        readConfig in interface ConfigProvider<M>
        Returns:
        the items; if no items were found, the stream will be empty. The returned stream shall never be null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurred while reading from configuration.
